import './post.css'; import { MoreVert } from '@material-ui/icons'; import { Users } from '../../dummyData.js'; import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Post({ post }) { const [like, setlike] = useState(post.like); return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.description}
{like} {Math.floor(Math.random() * 50)}
{post.comment} Comments
); }
